pipeline_name.key_comment: The name of the pipeline must be unique

is_enabled.key_comment: True indicates that the pipeline is enabled. The default is true

use_data_objects_spec.key_comment:
If true, load only the objects specified in data_objects_spec which will be configured in the next step.
If false, load all objects from the database_schema (or database_name if no schema exists) in specified in the source_attributes section.

object_name.key_comment: Specify a unique data_object name. It can be a table name for database or file/folder name for file export/import

target_object_name.key_comment: Optional! Specify target_object_name only if you want it to be different from source_object_name

recreate_target_object.key_comment: If this parameter is true, the target object (table) will be rebuilt. If false, the object/table will be created if it does not exists. The default is false

excluded_columns.key_comment: Specify a comma-separated list of columns to exclude. Leave empty to include all columns

load_batch_size.key_comment: Specify batch size for incremental load. It's not supported yet

incremental_load_column.key_comment: Incremental load column. It's not supported yet

skip_leading_rows.key_comment: Skip leading rows, numeric value, usually 1

file_format.key_comment: Relevant to file upload only. Currently only CSV format is supported

file_dir.key_comment: Relevant to file upload only. Specify path to file directory

file_name_list.key_comment: Relevant to file upload only. Specify the filenames to export or leave blank for all files

target_file_format.key_comment: Relevant to file extract only. Supports csv format only

target_file_dir.key_comment: Relevant to file extract only. Destination directory after saving data first to output folder
